Text: Merry Xmas Happy New Yearpst Hi Sally Wish you your family a very Merry Christmas and a wonderful new year Hope everything is going well for you you have been able to get sometime with your family during the holiday season I hate to bother you with this request because I realize you must be very busy I was wondering if you had a chance to forward my resume to Ginger Gamble at Reliant and Carol Scherer at Duke Energy The job market is really terrible right now and your recommendation will mean a lot for me Pl do let know if you would like me to resend my resume to you Best Regards Shruti Shruti GandhiGupta Solana Springs Dr Sugar Land TX Home Cell email Do You Yahoo Get your free yahoocom address at
